root.name: Kung Food
root.description: Kung food was released onto the Atari Lynx hand held system in 1992 and was developed by Lore Games Limited, and published and distributed by Atari.You play as a naked green man who must defeat the produce of a refrigerator by using his Kung-Fu skills. Your enemies include ice cubes, carrots and Watch out! tomatoes. The game is probably one of the hardest and most frustrating games you can find for the Lynx platform, with enemies popping up instantly and from nowhere, and killing you off. Graphically, the game looks sub-par, even for Atari Lynx standards.
